text: The life of inner peace, being harmonious and without stress, is the easiest type of existence.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

text: The Bush Administration's failure to be consistently involved in helping Israel achieve peace with the Palestinians has been both wrong for our friendship with Israel, as well as badly damaging to our standing in the Arab world.
author: Barack Obama

text: You can't separate peace from freedom because no one can be at peace unless he has his freedom.
author: Malcolm X

text: The happiness and peace attained by those satisfied by the nectar of spiritual tranquillity is not attained by greedy persons restlessly moving here and there.
author: Chanakya

text: I simply can't build my hopes on a foundation of confusion, misery and death... I think... peace and tranquillity will return again.
author: Anne Frank
